content: a pattern for a palestinian flag designed with a heart create this flag from your yarn scraps to pin it on at events make more for others to wear and share use up all your scraps ❤️✊ notes any yarn and hook can be used meeting gauge is not needed just keep in mind proportions and work until it looks right measurements in pattern are provided to work from as well inspiration and reference حياة كروشيه مينا mina crochet life on youtube https //www youtube com/watch v=pa8yt2w5kxw 1 1 https //www youtube com/watch v=pa8yt2w5kxw
